div.div: Determination of essential oils cytotoxicity on HEK293T.
div.p: Viability of HEK293T cells was determined by MTT assay upon treatment by the essential oils of CC (A); PG (B); VZ (C). Values are expressed as mean ± SEM (n = 3). Dashed line indicated the CC 10.
Click here for additional data file.
